name: Ball & Chain (Kartoffelsaft)
description:
Hit the red dots with your ball to gain score, but don't touch them yourself. Collect the blue dots to gain a score multiplier. Go for a high score!

Controls:

WASD - Move yourself

Arrow Keys - "Move" the ball

R - Restart
